channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: HP ZBook 8 Gli 14-Inch Review: An Unimpressive Workstation
item.description: Billed as a workstation (and priced accordingly), HP’s Zbook 8 falls short of dazzling.

item.title: ‘We Ain’t Seen Nothing Yet’—Trump’s Mass Deportations Will Only Grow From Here
item.description: Militias and far-right extremists believed they would be central to Trump’s mass deportation plans. Instead he militarized law enforcement agencies.

item.title: Purple Promo Codes and Deals: Up to 30% Off
item.description: On the hunt for the perfect mattress (and pillow)? Save on your soon-to-be favorite brand, Purple, with these coupons and deals.

item.title: The 40 Best Movies on HBO Max Right Now (January 2026)
item.description: One Battle After Another, Spinal Tap II: The End Continues, and It's Never Over, Jeff Buckley are just a few of the movies you should be watching on H...

item.title: The best distraction blockers to jumpstart your focus in the new year
item.description: Whether you need to limit social media scrolling or block off time to be productive, there are different tools that can help you stay on task

item.title: How to Set Up a Smartphone for Elderly Loved Ones
item.description: Here's how to make iPhone and Android devices a little easier to use.

item.title: How a Spanish virus brought Google to Málaga
item.description: Spanish entrepreneur Bernardo Quintero, whose company is at the root of Google's Málaga cybersecurity hub, identified the author of the computer virus...

item.title: Nvidia to license AI chip challenger Groq’s tech and hire its CEO
item.description: With Groq on its side, Nvidia is poised to become even more dominant in chip manufacturing.

item.title: The European startup market’s data doesn’t match its energy — yet
item.description: Europe's startup market hasn't produced meaningful numbers but there is reason to believe the data will start to change.

item.title: The year data centers went from backend to center stage
item.description: Data centers are no longer the boring tech issue they once were.
